data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 728 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Akrotiri.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Akrotiri, Akrotiri and Dhekelia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Akrotiri, Akrotiri and Dhekelia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 24 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 728 believers in Akrotiri, Akrotiri and Dhekelia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Akrotiri, Akrotiri and Dhekelia to the gospel today.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Akrotiri
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Akrotiri, Akrotiri, Akrotiri and Dhekelia.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Akrotiri, Akrotiri and Dhekelia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Akrotiri.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, there are 17,290 people in the state of Akrotiri who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness
